name.ja: <ruby>幻<rt>げん</rt></ruby><ruby>壊<rt>かい</rt></ruby><ruby>大鎧戸<rt>シャッター</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: Equip this card to 1 face-up Wyrm Type monster on your field.

effect.en: While the equipped monster is in Attack Position, it cannot be destroyed by battle. If a card is in a Field Zone, the equipped monster and this card cannot be destroyed by card effects.
